mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Team WHERE is_deleted = FALSE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Team ( team_name, formed_at, description, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{teamName}, #{formedAt}, #{description}, NOW(), NOW(), FALSE )
mapper.update: UPDATE Team SET team_name = #{teamName}, formed_at = #{formedAt}, description = #{description}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE team_id = #{teamId}
